## Client.subscribe() method

`subscribe` subscribes to the given topics.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(nextOrObserver: Observer<ClientEvent> | NextFn<ClientEvent>, error?: ErrorFn, complete?: CompleteFn): Unsubscribe;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
